website_summaries.verdict: An attractively priced, sturdy mini keg crafted in Germany that can hold up to five liters.
pros: High marks for being a hit at brewing parties for beer as well as other carbonated beverages
One of the most affordable options available
Steady results in terms of flavor and function
cons: Be sure to drink your beverage within a day or two

customer_reviews.title: Beware if you intend to carbonate!
customer_reviews.text: This mini-keg was not quite up to the task of holding carbonated beverage. It launched clear across the basement and made a huge mess! Make sure you find a quality manufacturer for your purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome home brew kegs!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome little kegs for home brew! These are fantastic with the Nostalgia Homecraft growler on tap system. This is my second order for a total of 5 kegs and will be buying more. The only reason for deducting a star is the second order of three didn't come with the 2 piece bung which is needed for my system. The first order came with them. Unlike other reviews mine have all came packaged nicely and appear flawless.
customer_reviews.author: Tglenn

customer_reviews.title: Rusts easily, beware!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible quality. Rusted after a single use. Rust on top rim and inside the keg along walls and around rim. Thankfully I checked inside, these are a real health hazard.
customer_reviews.author: Jaycapz

customer_reviews.title: Does not come with venting bung, just cap and pourer.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for the picobrew, same keg that comes with brewer minus vent bung. Description says comes with 2 bungs, not, 1 is plastic cap (top) and other is pouring. The cap as pictured in ad is not a bung. Picobrew model comes with proper bungs, including seal/carbonation bung.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher J. Inman

customer_reviews.title: Pours and taps, works with Avanti/ Igloo minikegerator
customer_reviews.text: This keg comes with a cap, but I would purchase an aftermarket cap. IT also comes with a gravity poor spout at lower edge of the keg, which I used once when my Co2 system broke. I brew small batches and condition in the keg, then tap it with the Avanti system. Two of these fits in the Avanti/Igloo minikegerator. These can be used alone with the pour spouts, and work well with the Avanti/igloo system.
customer_reviews.author: Brian C.

customer_reviews.title: Great second keg for Pico Pro
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mini keg to compliment my Pico Pro. I found that this holds the carbonate better than the brew keg and dispensing beer is easier. This product however is extremely difficult to clean. I use a combination of hot water and hydrogen peroxide. I would also invest in the long brush to help scrub the inside.
customer_reviews.author: Joe S.

customer_reviews.title: Works like it should
customer_reviews.text: First run in this one is complete. Works like it should. I might have to grab a few more of these if I continue to brew.
customer_reviews.author: GrayDizzle

customer_reviews.title: My beer tasted great.
customer_reviews.text: I just finished drinking my first batch of home-brew out of this and it worked perfectly. The only problem that I see is rust forming on the outside of the keg along the seem and where some wear marks are that were there when I got it.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry F.

customer_reviews.title: Did not come with 2 piece bung in order to carbonate and tap.
customer_reviews.text: The description indicates that the kegs come with the 2 piece bung so that you can carbonate your home brew and tap to dispense, but I did not receive any.

customer_reviews.title: well worth the money..
customer_reviews.text: these kegs are cheap as dirt and excellent quality... made in Germany not china... I bought these kegs..(i bought two because they were so cheap) so that i could keg my home brew. iam very glade i pulled the trigger on this. it worked out perfectly. if you plan on conditioning your home brew in these make sure you buy some keg lube and some better rubber keg bungs. I got two of them for 6 bucks... All in all a very cheap way to keg your beer.. it makes bottle day allot easier with a couple of these guys instead of what 54 12oz beer bottles.. pain in the ass to bottle that many beers.. just keg them dude.
customer_reviews.author: Casey H

customer_reviews.title: Stainless steel it's made of is quite thin so it could be dented easily. Plastic clouser feels a bit flimsy so you ...
customer_reviews.text: Even though Amazon says it's made in USA, the keg clearly states MADE IN GERMANY (look at the picture). Stainless steel it's made of is quite thin so it could be dented easily. Plastic clouser feels a bit flimsy so you may want to order rubber Mini Keg Bungs as well. I hope I'd be able to come back and update this review after real life's testing
customer_reviews.author: V(i)P

customer_reviews.title: Totally glad I moved away from bottles
customer_reviews.text: No problems, no leaks, no dents. Totally glad I moved away from bottles.
customer_reviews.author: David Williams

customer_reviews.title: Good product, bad description
customer_reviews.text: I think this will meet my needs, but as many others have noted in their reviews the description of the product is flat WRONG, there is NOT a 2 piece bung included with this product. If I wouldn't have read the reviews I would not have been able to use the product at all because I wouldn't have ordered the seperate bungs since they were to be included. So far I can say good product but bad product description, the seller is wholly responsible for an accurate description of the products they sell and should correct it as soon as they are aware of the descrepency.
customer_reviews.author: R. Tusing

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Had some small dents in the two I ordered. No problem.

customer_reviews.title: Kegs awsome
customer_reviews.text: The kegs came in time as it(he,she) promised to be, very well packed, though a bit struck and with dents but nothing of care. Very satisfied with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: EILENOVIEDO

customer_reviews.title: Give me the Facts
customer_reviews.text: It would really help if the company(s) selling this product gave you all the information you needed BEFORE you purchased it. It claims to be gravity fed. Well you can get 1 glass of foamy home brew, 2 if you give it a little shake, but then you tend to get a little sediment as well. You also have to buy the Bung as the little plastic seal it has holds no pressure what-so-ever. I have ordered a CO2 conversion for mine if this works I will probably buy 3 or 4 more. If the seller would have put this out there before I bought the first time they might already have more of my money and a better rating.
customer_reviews.author: Troy Meffert

customer_reviews.title: better then i thought it would be
customer_reviews.text: Great product not even a dent on it. Got here fast. Only thing i would point out buy a rubber bung the ones that come with it are cheap but that a side better then i thought it would be
customer_reviews.author: Trapper Dillon

customer_reviews.title: Buy something that won't rust.
customer_reviews.text: Almost a couple of months in and the seam at the top seems to be getting rusty. I've had nothing but water in the Keg, and I'd prefer not to die of an agonizing disease like tetanus. The inside of the can is coated, but not the top and not the plug area, so the moisture that gets around the cap must start rusting the metal. As neat as the steel body looks, it would probably be safer to get a glass or plastic jug.
customer_reviews.author: Sandshrew

customer_reviews.title: ... from Home Brew Ohio to replace the cheap plastic useless cap that comes with it
customer_reviews.text: It would receive 5 stars if I didn't have to purchase a 2 piece reusable Rubber Mini Keg Bung from Home Brew Ohio to replace the cheap plastic useless cap that comes with it. If you want your beverage air tight the rubber bung is necessary. Other than that I'm very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Islanders Man

customer_reviews.title: Not as described
customer_reviews.text: These are not as pictured. They are all dented in and beat up. I almost think they are used. If you want something that is dented and beaten up, buy them. But if you want what is in the picture, go somewhere else. Contacted the seller with no response.

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality, Needs a Better Bung
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 8 of these kegs and they are great quality. Nice, sturdy construction. However, the "bung" that comes with the kegs is more of a weak, temporary cap and not an appropriate bung. Bottom line: these are great kegs, but buy the Rubber Mini Keg Bungs to go with them. With the two together, you cannot miss.
